AP Pro Football Writer DALLAS( AP)- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. In an unexpected announcement, Google CEO Eric Schmidt has announced that as of today he will be stepping down from the captain's chair and will be replaced by co-founder Larry Page. official blog, Eric Schmidt said When I joined Google in 2001 I never imagined-even in my wildest dreams-that we would get as far, as fast as we have today. Search has quite literally changed people's lives-increasing the collective sum of the world's knowledge and revolutionizing advertising in the process.
